Card.Mechanics: Plus 5 Points
Card.CardText: A mysterious note floats down to Lex off of a chilling breeze. On it are the words scrawled: "Curiosity killed the cat."

Card.Mechanics: Random Terrain +2 Magic
Card.CardText: With a flourish of his wand, trees make way and thistles monsters retreat. Lex moves to a random terrain. +2 Magic

Card.Mechanics: Until moved terrain, +1 point per day phase
Card.CardText: These magical plants will be delicious if Lex grows them completely. +1 Point per day phase until moved terrain

Card.Mechanics: Draw a card
Card.CardText: The knight who wrote this didn't have a lot to say, but Lex gleans what he can. Draw a card.

Card.Mechanics: Plus 2 Points
Card.CardText: A kettle that informs its owner politely when its water is boiling. A fine addition to any household.

Card.Mechanics: Enables burning cards during the next night phase
Card.CardText: Lex finds a lantern that just doesn't seem to want to go out, making it possible to burn cards during the night.

Card.Mechanics: Can't lose points until next morning phase. 20< Draw a card
Card.CardText: Lex finds a magic flying broomstick that proves to be difficult to control.

Card.Mechanics: Cant be burned. +5 Points. Add "Well Kept House Owner's Return" to AI deck
Card.CardText: This house is much too clean to be abandoned, but nobody's home!

Card.Mechanics: Plus 2 Points. Add "Harding Manor Stables" to Lex deck
Card.CardText: You can only wonder what door this might open.

Card.Mechanics: View top 3 cards of deck
Card.CardText: Lex meets a palmist willing to give him secrets of the future.

Card.Mechanics: Skip the AI's turn this day phase
Card.CardText: Lex has found a tattered, yet surprisingly protective, tent. The Wild's will not harm him for a time.

Card.Mechanics: Plus 3 Magic
Card.CardText: Out here, getting rusty isn't an option.

Card.Mechanics: Plus 3 Points
Card.CardText: Not only does jogging prepare Lex for a hard day of survival, but it's a great way of covering ground!

Card.Mechanics: Plus 2 Magic, plus 2 Points
Card.CardText: The apparition Lex summons says it will keep watch. At the very least, it makes him feel better.

Card.Mechanics: Lose 2 Points, Plus 4 Magic, move to random terrain
Card.CardText: Swamp gas is more flammable than Lex realized! His eyebrows may be gone, but at least he landed outside the Swamp.

Card.Mechanics: Move to Forest. Do not move randomly at end of day.
Card.CardText: Lex finds himself in the Forest!

Card.Mechanics: Move to Hills. Do not move randomly at end of day.
Card.CardText: Lex finds himself in the Hills!

Card.Mechanics: Move to Swamp. Do not move randomly at end of day.
Card.CardText: Lex finds himself in the Swamp!

Card.Mechanics: Move to Cave. Do not move randomly at end of day.
Card.CardText: Lex finds himself in the Caves!

Card.Mechanics: 15< +2 Magic
Card.CardText: If Lex has 15 or more magic, he finds some tasty mushrooms that have grown overnight. +2 Magic

Card.Mechanics: 20> Draw 2 cards, 20< +5 Magic
Card.CardText: If Magic is less than 20, Lex draws 2 cards. If Magic is more than 20, Lex gains +5 Magic

Card.Mechanics: Discard hand, +3 Magic
Card.CardText: The most streamlined introductory text to date, and a staple part of any alchemistâ€™s education. Lex spends some time brushing up on the basics. Lex Discards his hand. +3 Magic.

Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue Sequence. 50% Chance Draw two cards & +1 Point // 50% -3 Points
Card.CardText: Lex is approached by a suspiciously eloquent merchant on his travels.

Card.Mechanics: Move to random terrain, draw up to full
Card.CardText: The thin, silvery strand wraps around his wand and guides his way.

Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue Sequence, Plus 6 points
Card.CardText: Lex encounters an old talking tree on a hill who asks him for a favor.

Card.Mechanics: Move to random terrain, +4 Points
Card.CardText: Poking around pays off when a small path reveals itself. +4 points Lex moves to a random terrain.

Card.Mechanics: Draw until full. 30 Magic> +2 Points for each card drawn. 30 Magic< +2 Magic for each card drawn.
Card.CardText: Lex draws until hand is full and gains 2 points for each card drawn this way. If lex has more than 30 magic, he gains 2 magic per card instead.

Card.Mechanics: CHOOSE: -4 Points, Enables burning cards during next night phase /OR/ Draw 2 cards
Card.CardText: A petite young woman greets Lex, grins wildly, and expertly stabs a knife into a red mass. "The most moist meat around!"

Card.Mechanics: Skip a day phase, draw a card, +3 Magic
Card.CardText: Lex finds, hidden away, something soft and lacy, and promptly faints of embarrassment.

Card.Mechanics: Move to random terrain. -4 Points
Card.CardText: The cave can be confusing, and Lex gets lost, eventually finding his way out of the caves. Lex moves to a random terrain, -4 Points.

Card.Mechanics: Trigger dialogue sequence, CHOOSE:-10 Points, +10 Magic /OR/ Nothing
Card.CardText: Lex finds a beautiful lake guarded by a lone dragon. The dragon offers a drink in exchange for some gold. If Lex chooses to give a gift to Qilin, he loses 10 points and gains 10 magic. If not, nothing happens.

Card.Mechanics: 25 Magic > +6 Magic, 25 Magic < +3 Magic
Card.CardText: The spirit takes pity on Lex's inexperience in magic. +3 Magic If magic is less than 25, +6 Magic instead

Card.Mechanics: Discard one card, draw two cards
Card.CardText: Lex is overtaken by a heavy mist and finds he is missing something once out the other side. Lex discards one card and draws two cards.

Card.Mechanics: Cannot leave terrain until next morning phase. +3 Points
Card.CardText: Lex cannot leave the terrain until the next morning phase but finds some valuable gems in the caveâ€™s crystals. +3 Points

Card.Mechanics: Plus 6 Points.
Card.CardText: The nobility of the manor are very rude about Lex being a wizard, so he settles for spending the night with their horses - without permission, of course. Since Lex has the Massive Metal Key, he finds gold hidden in a storage room. +6 Points
